Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 159%{passiveImg:up_g}
- "DB Saga", "Youth" or "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category allies' 
Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow 
Ki Spheres
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 159%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 
10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*3 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 1 or more Ki Spheres 
obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn*
- DEF 159%{passiveImg:up_g}
*5 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 3 or more Ki Spheres 
obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn*
- Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of 
becoming a Super Attack
*7 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 5 or more Ki Spheres 
obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn*
- All allies' chance of performing a critical hit & damage 
reduction rate 8%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' ATK & DEF 8%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turns

7514.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn 
and causes immense damage to enemy

7515.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK and 
greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes immense damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers ATK
7515.superCausality:
Activated when there is an ally whose name 
includes "Yamcha", "Master Roshi", "Oolong", 
"Bulma (Youth)" or "Bulma (Bunny)" 
attacking in the same turn

Active Skill.Name: Angry Kamehameha
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Raises ATK by 800% temporarily 
then causes damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, attacks have 
a 59% chance of becoming critical hits
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated after the character 
receives an attack 8 or more times in battle, 
or when HP is 59% or less (once only)

Button.Name: Has this character recieved their 8th attack in battle?

Slider.Name: How many attacks has this character recieved?

Button.Name: Is HP 59 % or less?

Slider.Name: What percentage of HP is remaining?
